Sugar_Land.Alief Kerr High School:
Alief Kerr High School is a magnet school located in the Alief community, near the city of Houston in an unincorporated area of Harris County, Texas, United States. The school is a part of the Alief Independent School District and serves grades 9 through 12.
Kerr High School was awarded the Blue Ribbon School Award of Excellence by the United States Department of Education, the highest award an American school can receive, during the 2010-11 school year.
